{"id":1115787378,"question_id":3225,"lang":"java","lang_name":"Java","time":"6Â months","timestamp":1702134302,"status":10,"status_display":"Accepted","runtime":"208 ms","url":"/submissions/detail/1115787378/","is_pending":"Not Pending","title":"Length of Longest Subarray With at Most K Frequency","memory":"69.4 MB","code":"class Solution {\n    public int maxSubarrayLength(int[] nums, int k) {\n        \n        HashMap<Integer, Integer> map = new HashMap<>();// nums[i], freq\n        \n        TreeMap<Integer, Set<Integer>> fmap = new TreeMap<>(); // freq , Set<nums[i]>\n        \n        int len = nums.length;\n        \n        int res = 0;\n        int st= 0;\n        \n        for(int i=0; i<len;i++){\n            \n            map.put(nums[i], map.getOrDefault(nums[i],0)+1);\n            int f =map.get(nums[i]);\n            fmap.putIfAbsent(f, new HashSet<>());\n            fmap.get(f).add(nums[i]);\n            \n            // if(fmap.lastKey()<=k)\n            //     continue;\n            \n            while(fmap.lastKey()>k){\n                f = map.get(nums[st]);\n                map.put(nums[st], map.getOrDefault(nums[st],0)-1);\n                fmap.get(f).remove(nums[st]);\n                \n                if(fmap.get(f).size()==0)\n                    fmap.remove(f);\n                st++;\n                \n            }\n            \n            res = Math.max(res, i-st+1);\n            \n        }\n        \n        return res;\n            \n        \n    }\n}","compare_result":"","title_slug":"length-of-longest-subarray-with-at-most-k-frequency","has_notes":false,"flag_type":1}
